name: Target Shot
description:
Features:
- 6 Game Modes: Classic, Streak, Timed, Rapid, Sport, & Trick
- 2D & 3D Options for Each Mode (12 Modes Total)
- 108 Medals to Earn
- Customizable Targets. Use the face of your arch nemesis as motivation.

Test your aim with Target Shot! Can you hit the center of the target and earn all 108 gold medals? Choose from several different game modes:

Classic - 10 balls to rack up the best score you can!
Streak - See how many targets you can hit in a row!
Timed - 30 seconds to hit as many targets as you can!
Rapid - Move quickly! These targets disappear after only a moment.
Sport - Fans of Skeet Shooting will enjoy trying to hit these moving targets.
Trick - These shots require some thought & creativity. Find the right angle and release!
